official-title.#text:
To prohibit wholesalers from purchasing prescription
		  drugs from pharmacies, and to enhance information and transparency regarding
		  drug wholesalers engaged in interstate commerce.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Gray Market Drug Reform and
			 Transparency Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
